sdkInit.introduction: First step is to install the Core AeroGear module, the module manages and binds all services together on the client side.

keycloak.serviceDescription: Identity Management - Identity and Access Management

commands: Install the AeroGear Auth package from NPM

push.serviceDescription: Installs a metrics service based on Prometheus and Grafana

metrics.serviceDescription: Installs a metrics service based on Prometheus and Grafana
